game-description:
This game is made of Vanilla JavaScript and CSS Animations.
Want to download this game on your computer ?
- Follow Github repository link below,
- Click on 'Code' green button,
- Download Zip file,
- Unzip downloaded file on your computer,
Open 'index.html' file in your browser.
Repository Link : https://github.com/Sylvie-C/fortuneteller.

This game is developped with ReactJS and Vite.
It is deployed with Netlify.
Repository link : https://github.com/Sylvie-C/minesweeper_2024.

Want to play offline ?
- Go to zip folder here,
- click download icon or 'View Raw' link,
- go to your downloads folder, unzip downloaded file on your computer, launch index.html file.
